BaseStackName.Description: The name of the base stack

DynamoDBTableName.Description: The name of the DynamoDB table

APIGatewayName.Description: The name of the API Gateway

AWSCredentials.Description: The AWS credentials for deploying the stacks

ASPNETConfiguration.Description: The ASP.NET configuration for the lambda stacks

FunctionNames.Description: The function names in the ASP.NET applications

MessageNames.Description: The message names used in the ASP.NET applications

DOMElementIDs.Description: The IDs of the DOM elements used in the ASP.NET applications

DataSchemas.Description: The data schemas used in the DynamoDB table

APIGatewayPaths.Description: The paths under the base API Gateway

PowerShellScriptNames.Description: The names of the PowerShell scripts for deploying the stacks
